Tyrael stood up so every crew member sitting there could see him.

Tyrael: Last Deca-cycle, I was nominated to take the lead of the
Tripredacus Strikers to bring back Predacon renegade and criminal
Megatron. His presence was a nuisance to our goals and threatened to
awaken the Predacons' sensibility to the Tripredacus manipulation that
was going on. I departed along with my crew and followed the stolen
maximal freighter to here, prehistoric earth. We fought mostly against
the Predacons, but Megatron was not killed or captured. However, he
merged with Galvatron and became Hydras. This caused dissidence
amongst predacon troops. When you arrived insystem and contacted me,
we had allied with the Maximals and the dissident Predacons in order
to bring down Hydras. Although we fended off the attack with no loss
in personel, our ship was destroyed by a very powerful attack. The
stasis pods that were contained in it were sent away, some here and
others elsewhere on the planet, and special data has been retrieved
before the destruction was complete. 

He turned to Blackheart.

Tyrael: Before making any recommendations, General, I would like to
know your objectives here and the situation on Cybertron.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> Blackheart nodded. "Very well you go first."
